name: realLorentzTensor.tacticDualMapTactic

name: realLorentzTensor.«term_|_»
declaration:
/-- Notation for the construction of a tensor index from a tensor and a string.
Conditions are checked automatically. -/
def realLorentzTensor.«term_|_»  : Lean.TrailingParserDescr

name: realLorentzTensor.fromIndexStringColor
declaration:
/-- The construction of a tensor index from a tensor and a string satisfying conditions
which can be automatically checked. This is a modified version of
`TensorStructure.TensorIndex.mkDualMap` specific to real Lorentz tensors. -/
def realLorentzTensor.fromIndexStringColor {d : ℕ} {n : ℕ} {cn : Fin n → realTensorColor.Color} (T : TensorStructure.Tensor (realLorentzTensor d) cn) (s : String) (hs : IndexNotation.listCharIsIndexString realTensorColor.Color (String.toList s) = true) (hn : n = IndexNotation.IndexList.length (IndexNotation.IndexString.toIndexList' s hs)) (hD : IndexNotation.IndexList.OnlyUniqueDuals (IndexNotation.IndexString.toIndexList' s hs)) (hC : IndexNotation.IndexList.ColorCond.bool (IndexNotation.IndexString.toIndexList' s hs) = true) (hd : TensorColor.ColorMap.DualMap.boolFin (IndexNotation.IndexList.colorMap (IndexNotation.IndexString.toIndexList' s hs))
    (cn ∘ Fin.cast ⋯) =
  true) : TensorStructure.TensorIndex (realLorentzTensor d)

name: realLorentzTensor.«term_⊗ᵀ_»
declaration:
/-- The product of Real Lorentz tensors. Conditions on indices are checked automatically. -/
def realLorentzTensor.«term_⊗ᵀ_»  : Lean.TrailingParserDescr
